mapper.select: select , tc.name AS trainCourseName, tcc.name AS trainCourseCategoryName, epc.name AS examPaperCategoryName from exam_examination exam_examination left join train_course tc on exam_examination.train_course_id = tc.id left join train_course_category tcc on tcc.id = tc.train_course_category_id left join exam_paper ep on exam_examination.exam_paper_id = ep.id left join exam_paper_category epc on ep.exam_paper_category_id = epc.id where exam_examination.id = #{id}
